Articles.Content:
I don't know what I'm missing, set proper layers, tags, pivots in unity, checked cfg. All functionality works except I cannot access ladder nor airlock. I tried different placements, shapes of colliders, reducing part base collider to 1 with overlapping origin and still dunno why it doesn't work. After EVA I can hover mouse over suppedly airlock area and it correctly shows 'crew hatch', Kerbal can feel its collider but the sign' press f...' doesn't show up.

Any ideas what I am missing?

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/4rAmM)
"Is Trigger" needs ticking for ladder & airlock colliders.

> 
> "Is Trigger" needs ticking for ladder & airlock colliders.

yes, that was the problem, thank you very much ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

rio
